title: Love Will Tear Us Apart
lyrics:
(Em) (D) (Bm) (A)
 
When (Em)routine bites hard… (D) and am(Bm)bitions… are low (A)
And re(Em)sentment rides high(D) but e(Bm)motions… won't (A)grow
And we're (Em)changing our ways (D) taking (Bm)different… (A)roads
 
(Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
(Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
 
Why is this (Em)bedroom so cold? (D) You turned a(Bm)way on your (A)side
Is my (Em)timing that flawed(D) our res(Bm)pect run so (A)dry?
Yet there's (Em)still this appeal(D) that we've (Bm)kept through our (A)lives
 
(Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
(Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
 
You (Em)cry out in your sleep(D) all my (Bm) failings… ex(A)posed
There’s a (Em)taste in my mouth (D) as despe(Bm)ration takes (A)hold
Why is it (Em)something so good(D) just (Bm)can't function no (A)more?
 
When (Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
(Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
(Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
(Em)Love… (D)love will tear us a(Bm)part… a(A)gain
(Em-single strum) [end]
